entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -24.7°C

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 80 %

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
